title: Emerald Radiance: Statement Diamond & Emerald Necklace
materials: 7 stones). The Diamonds are Marquise (+7):0.65(12) and Marquise (-7):-2.05(63). The Diamonds are Pan (+7):-12.77(170) and Pan(-7):-5.20(120).
features: A stunning contemporary necklace featuring a floral pattern meticulously crafted with brilliant-cut diamonds and pear-shaped emeralds. The emeralds are set in a prong setting to maximize their brilliance. The necklace is designed with a flexible construction for comfortable wear. The delicate diamond detailing accentuates the vibrant green of the emeralds.
colors: Primarily white (diamonds) and green (emeralds) with a subtle golden sheen from the GH polished Base Metal.
occasions: and special occasions where you want to make a bold yet elegant statement. It can also be worn during festivals like Diwali or Dussehra for a contemporary take on traditional jewelry.
description: This necklace combines modern design aesthetics with the timeless elegance of diamonds and emeralds. The intricate floral pattern and vibrant color combination make it a truly unique piece. The piece is perfect for those seeking a modern twist on traditional South Indian jewelry. The high-quality gemstones and precise craftsmanship ensure its durability and lasting beauty.
